traits.description: A measure of one's inclination towards new experiences versus comfort in routine.
traits.subheaderDescription: If you feel more energized when trying new experiences, this trait highlights your adventurous spirit.

questions.text: I feel more energized when trying new experiences than when sticking to my usual routine.

traits.description: A measure of one's desire to learn new things compared to sharing existing knowledge.
traits.subheaderDescription: If you enjoy learning new things more than sharing what you already know, this trait reflects your curiosity.

questions.text: I enjoy learning new things more than sharing what I already know.

traits.description: A measure of one's comfort in social settings compared to preference for solitude.
traits.subheaderDescription: If you thrive in social settings rather than enjoying time alone, this trait highlights your sociability.

questions.text: I thrive in social settings rather than enjoying time alone.

traits.description: A measure of one's preference for practical solutions versus exploring theoretical ideas.
traits.subheaderDescription: If you prefer practical solutions over exploring theoretical ideas, this trait reflects your pragmatic nature.

questions.text: I prefer practical solutions over exploring theoretical ideas.

traits.description: A measure of one's tendency to take charge versus supporting others.
traits.subheaderDescription: If you naturally take charge in group situations rather than supporting others from the background, this trait indicates leadership qualities.

questions.text: I naturally take charge in group situations rather than supporting others from the background.

traits.description: A measure of one's reliance on emotions versus logical reasoning in decision-making.
traits.subheaderDescription: If you often rely on your feelings when making decisions instead of logical reasoning, this trait highlights your emotional orientation.

questions.text: I often rely on my feelings when making decisions instead of logical reasoning.

traits.description: A measure of one's preference for creative chaos versus structured planning.
traits.subheaderDescription: If you embrace creative chaos rather than sticking to a structured plan, this trait reflects your creative mindset.

questions.text: I embrace creative chaos rather than sticking to a structured plan.

traits.description: A measure of one's tendency to prioritize others' feelings versus self-reliance.
traits.subheaderDescription: If you tend to prioritize others' feelings over your own needs, this trait highlights your empathetic nature.

questions.text: I tend to prioritize others' feelings over my own needs.

traits.description: A measure of one's interest in new methods compared to adherence to traditional practices.
traits.subheaderDescription: If you are more interested in exploring new methods than adhering to traditional practices, this trait reflects your experimental nature.

questions.text: I am more interested in exploring new methods than adhering to traditional practices.

traits.description: A measure of one's tendency to reflect and analyze versus jumping straight into action.
traits.subheaderDescription: If you prefer to reflect and analyze rather than jump straight into action, this trait highlights your thoughtful approach.

questions.text: I prefer to reflect and analyze rather than jump straight into action.
